name: Widget Bomb
description:
Widget Bomb - A casual game in your notification center. Just drag down from the top on your screen to reveal the notification center and your new game will be there waiting for you! simply click the screen to emit the weapons, and to kill the enemies.

You can also customize the game appearance by changing background color, or by changing the player with weapons, or by changing enemies.

Try out this silly simple but very amusing game in your notification center. Take this challenge, Get Ready?
